text: @realDonaldTrump (3) THERE’S SO MANY PEOPLE WHO THINK🤔 THAT THE SILENT DEADLY CORONAVIRUS🦠😷🤒 IS IN FACT A HOAX STILL. I’ve READ so many articles that state, that the  SILENT DEADLY CORONAVIRUS🦠😷🤒 has return in some COUNTRIES and other COUNTRIES it has BEGUN TO INCREASE.
